title: Tim Burton exhibition archive
subject_group: Crafts & Visual Arts/Australian Centre for the Moving Image
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Australian Centre for the Moving Image
abstract: Nine short clips created as part of Tim Burton : the exhibition. These clips cover such events as the installation of key elements, the festivities around the exhibition and responses from the general public.
description: Contents: The Installation of Balloon Boy (ed. Csilla Csongvay, 1 min, 21/6/2010)--The Installation of the Batmobile (ed. David Meagher, 2 min, 16/6/2010)--Thursday night Burton Club (ed. Csilla Csongvay, 1 min, 24/6/2010)--Installation of the Topiary Deer (ed. David Meagher,1 min 16/6/2010)--Flip book for ACMI Blog (ed. David Meagher, 1 min, 19/10/2010)--Headless Horseman (ed. David Meagher, 2 min, 6/7/2010)--Vox pops for ACMI Blog (ed. Richard Greenhalgh, 7 min, 16/9/2010)--Young Burton tour guides (ed. Jason White, 3 min, 22/6/2010)--Media launch (ed. David Meagher, 3 min, 23/6/2010)
